author: Staff Reporter
text:
Mettupalayam Police have registered a case against a 28-year-old woman for disposing of the body of her premature girl baby in a garbage dump at SM Nagar, on Nellithurai Road, in Mettupalayam on Monday.

K. Maheshwari of Uppupallam in Mettupalayam was delivered of a premature girl baby on the way to hospital, a couple of days ago. She disposed of the body in a garbage dump and got herself admitted to Coimbatore Medical College Hospital. On Monday, municipal supervisor K. Balakrishnan found the body in the dump and alerted police. The police have registered a case under section 318 (concealment of birth by secret disposal of body) of the Indian Penal Code.
title: Case against woman
